{"id":836850456,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"5Â months","timestamp":1667579762,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/836850456/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Vowels of a String","memory":"8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string reverseVowels(string s) {\n        vector<char>v;\n        for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++){\n            if(s[i]=='a' ||s[i]=='e'||s[i]=='i'||s[i]=='o'||s[i]=='u'|| s[i]=='A' ||s[i]=='E'||s[i]=='I'||s[i]=='O'||s[i]=='U'){\n                v.push_back(s[i]);\n                s[i]='>';\n            }\n        }\n        // reverse(v.begin(),v.end());\n        int j=v.size()-1;\n        for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++){\n            if(s[i]=='>'){\n                s[i]=v[j];\n                j--;\n\n            }\n        }\n        return s;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-vowels-of-a-string","has_notes":false}
